scripts.build: cd client && npm install && cross-env REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run build
scripts.pkg:linux: cd cli && npm install && pkg . --targets latest-linux-x64 --output ../dist/cmdgen-linux
scripts.pkg:win: cd cli && npm install && pkg . --targets latest-win-x64 --output ../dist/cmdgen-win.exe
scripts.pkg:macos: cd cli && npm install && pkg . --targets latest-macos-x64 --output ../dist/cmdgen-macos
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:win && npm run pkg:macos
